usage_rules.labels: font-mono uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-[10px] or text-xs font-bold

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 text-white text-[10px] font-black uppercase tracking-[0.2em] py-3 px-6 rounded-sm transition-all shadow-lg shadow-blue-600/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 text-white text-[10px] font-bold uppercase tracking-[0.2em] py-3 px-6 rounded-sm transition-all
buttons.gold: bg-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-white text-black text-[10px] font-black uppercase tracking-[0.2em] py-3 px-6 rounded-sm transition-all shadow-lg shadow-yellow-500/10
buttons.ghost: text-slate-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 text-[10px] font-mono uppercase tracking-widest py-2 px-4 rounded-sm transition-all

cards.base: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden relative group hover:border-blue-500/20 transition-all duration-500

inputs.underline: bg-transparent border-b border-white/10 py-3 focus:outline-none focus:border-blue-500 transition-colors text-sm font-light placeholder:text-slate-700
inputs.box: bg-[#0F0F0F] border border-white/10 rounded-lg py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 transition-all text-sm placeholder:text-slate-700

badges.default: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-[9px] font-mono uppercase tracking-widest bg-white/5 text-slate-400 border border-white/5
badges.blue: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-[9px] font-mono uppercase tracking-widest bg-blue-500/10 text-blue-400 border border-blue-500/20
badges.gold: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-[9px] font-mono uppercase tracking-widest bg-yellow-500/10 text-[#D4AF37] border border-yellow-500/20

visual_enhancers.grid_background: background-image: linear-gradient(#3B82F6 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, #3B82F6 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 60px 60px; opacity: 0.03;

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building the Client Portal and Admin Dashboard extensions. You MUST strictly adhere to the Dark Theme (#050505). Do not introduce light mode components.
instructions_to_main_agent.navigation: Implement a Sidebar Layout for the Portal/Admin pages. The Landing Page (index.html) should remain as is, but the 'Login' button should redirect to /login.
instructions_to_main_agent.auth_pages: Login/Register pages should be centered, minimal, with a glassmorphism card effect on the form container. Use the 'Crown' logo prominently.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard_layout: Use the 'Bento Grid' (Mode B) for the dashboard summary. High density, no wasted space.
instructions_to_main_agent.tables: For Admin/Orders lists, use Shadcn Table but customize it: transparent background, border-b border-white/5, mono uppercase headers text-slate-500.
instructions_to_main_agent.forms: For the 'Intake Form', use the 'Underline' input style to feel like a premium document. For Admin forms, use the 'Box' style for density.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts. Colors: Blue (#3B82F6) for primary data, Gold (#D4AF37) for secondary/highlight data. Dark tooltip background.
instructions_to_main_agent.icons: Use Lucide-React. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) in kebab-case (e.g., 'login-submit-btn').

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ðŸ’¡ðŸ”® etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
